identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a 'Botanical Ledger' aestheticâ€”fusing Swiss precision with organic warmth. Break the sterile ERP mold while maintaining absolute data clarity.
principles: Content: Data is the hero; Chrome is the servant
Negative Space: Luxurious padding even in data-dense views

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Modal titles

mono.usage: Financial data, IDs, Dates, Calculated fields

primary.name: Forest Deep
primary.usage: Primary Actions, Active States, Brand Identity

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-emerald-900 text-white hover:bg-emerald-800 shadow-sm font-medium px-6 py-2.5
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 font-medium px-6 py-2.5

tables.header: bg-slate-50 text-slate-600 font-semibold text-xs uppercase tracking-wider h-12

visual_enhancers.texture: bg-[url('https://www.transparenttextures.com/patterns/cubes.png')] bg-fixed opacity-[0.03] pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-0

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle textures.
DO NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Manrope'.
ALWAYS use 'JetBrains Mono' for currency and area calculations.
Use 'recharts' for charts with custom tooltips (no default styles).
Inputs must have a height of h-11 (44px) for better touch targets.
Forms must be sectioned with clear visual dividers.
Avoid pure black (#000000). Use Slate-950 (#020617) for text.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a Land Agreement Management System. Follow the 'Botanical Ledger' aesthetic. Use the provided JSON for all styling decisions. Implement the Dashboard with the 'Control Room' grid. Use the 'Spreadsheet View' for the agreement list. Ensure the 'Add Agreement' modal is sectioned and spacious. Use the provided image URLs for the login screen and dashboard header. Prioritize data accuracy and legibility over flashy animations.
